entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:02 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Springbank Airport 1:50 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

Temperature: -9.5°C

Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 93 %

entry.title: Thursday: Fog dissipating. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating early this afternoon then sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
